citation.title: Could SARS-CoV-2 be transmitted via speech droplets?

news.title: New research sheds light on how the coronavirus travels through the air — you probably won't walk through virus 'clouds,' but healthcare workers are at risk
news.summary: The new coronavirus typically spreads when droplets from an infected patient coughs or sneezes, and the droplets land on or get inhaled by another person.

news.title: News story from Daily Mail on Tuesday 07 April 2020
Coronavirus can be spread by speaking but is stopped by face masks
news.summary: Any form of cloth mouth cover, including a mask, can stop coronavirus spreading via invisible saliva droplets when an infected person talks, a study has found.

news.title: Saliva spray during speech could transmit coronavirus – study
news.summary: Tiny droplets of saliva that are sprayed into the air when people speak may be sufficient to spread coronavirus, according to US government scientists who say the finding could help control the outbreak.

news.title: Experts can’t agree on how long the coronavirus lingers in the air, and the controversy has huge implications for mask-wearing
news.summary: The CDC recommends people in the US wear masks when they must venture out into public places right now, in case they are infected with COVID-19.

news.title: Speech and singing might spray the coronavirus further than 6 feet. Here's what that means for loud talkers.
news.summary: Three-quarters of a Washington State choir group got infected with coronavirus after a rehearsal, and experts are saying it's a reminder of how far these coronavirus-laced droplets can travel.

news.title: Does singing spread coronavirus? Choir outbreaks raise concerns
news.summary: TORONTO -- Experts say coronavirus outbreaks at choirs across the U.S. and Europe, despite physical distancing measures, reinforce how far COVID-19 respiratory droplets can travel, especially when singing.

blogs.title: A vy s kým koronténujete? (Ako sa bezpečne stretávať počas karantény)
blogs.summary: Pre šírenie koronavírusu sú najrizikovejšie dlhšie trvajúce blízke stretnutia v intímnej vzdialenosti. Ak nechcete tráviť najbližšie mesiace len s členmi svojej domácnosti, vyberte si svoju mikro-komunitu a nemeňte ju, kým sa nedáte zaočkova
